measurements.description: Two flowers on two 4.6-cm inflorescences; dorsal sepal strongly yellow speckled purple, concentrated at midrib, cauda yellow-green, 5.9cm of the 7.4-cm dorsal length; lateral sepals white, caudae yellow-green, 5.0cm of the 7.2-cm lateral length ; petals minute, white; lip white, edged purple, purple spots; substance light-medium; texture matte.
